definition: to return empty (i.e. to drive back with no passengers or freight)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: I want to go home now because I'm hungry.
sentences.chinese: 我現在想回空，因爲我餓了。

sentences.english: The stack reacts to the timeout by resetting the congestion window back to an empty state.
sentences.chinese: 棧對超時的響應是把擁塞窗口重設回空狀態。

definition: to return/to go back/to come back
to pull/to draw/to pull back/to withdraw/to flash past
lit. to reverse the rotation of the sky/fig. to reverse a desperate situation
to start up (a motor)/to launch (a computer application)
to turn back/to retrace one's steps
to fly magically through the air
